page.title: 03A DAY AT LEIGHTON PARK
page.content: At Leighton Park boarders are woken at 7.30 by the bell.They make their way down to breakfast which ends at 8.20.During this time the day pupils arrive, at 8.50" Collect" starts (this is a general type of Quaker assembly). At 9.15 lessons start,these consist of a wide range of subjects. There is a short break at 11.30. After this lessons continue until 1.10 when pupils go to their boarding house for lunch.Lessons continue after lunch until 3.45, after which the pupils have time to themselves unless there is compulsory sports on that day. This is followed by tea at 5.30. After tea there is an hour set aside for hobbies or activities ,(over 60 of them!!.) Immediately after this one must do prep for 1\ hours. Later, the boarders go to bed and day pupils go home.
